```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(scales)
```
```{r}
COVID <- data.table::fread("COVID-19-age-sex.csv")
COVID <- janitor::clean_names(COVID)

```
```{r}

ggplot(COVID) + geom_col(aes(x=age_group,y=total_deaths)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) +
  labs(title="Total Deaths by Age Group",x="Age Group",y="Total Deaths")
```
```{r}
COVID %>% filter(total_deaths >=0) %>%
ggplot() + geom_col(aes(x=age_group,y=total_deaths/sum(total_deaths))) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) + 
  scale_y_continuous(labels=percent) +
  labs(title="Deaths by Age Group as Percentage",x="Age Group",y="% of Age")
```
